rows.tags: covid+ cases, covid positive cases, daily count, cumulative count
rows.dashboard_short_desc: This dashboard provides the daily, cumulative, and 7-day average COVID+ patient counts within the Enclave.
This dashboard provides a downloadable snapshot of the cumulative demographic data for all patients in the Enclave.

rows.dashboard_short_desc: This dashboard breaks down the counts of patients with select comorbidities by COVID status, the incidence in relation to COVID+ diagnosis, and demographics.
This dashboard breaks down the counts of patients with diabetes (types 1 and 2) by COVID status, the incidence in relation to COVID diagnosis, and demographics.

This dashboard provides an overview of the patients prescribed Paxlovid, including demographic information, associated medications, conditions, and outcomes.
This dashboard breaks down the counts of COVID+ patients prescribed  Sotrovimab by vaccination status, the occurrence of other comorbidities in relation to prescription, severity, and demographics.

This dashboard provides data on patients with dates of death occurring after a hospitalization for COVID or Long COVID within the Enclave.

rows.tags: regional distribution, patient distribution, patient map
rows.dashboard_short_desc: This dashboard shows the regional distribution of COVID+ patients within the Enclave and the number of contributing sites in each region.

rows.dashboard_short_desc: This dashboard provides a snapshot of COVID-19 reinfection counts and reinfection intervals within the Enclave.

rows.dashboard_short_desc: This dashboard shows the first infection dates of patients reinfected with COVID-19 in any particular month.
This dashboard shows the breakdown of smoking status by demographics and severity for COVID+ patients in the Enclave.
